name: render_story_examples
description: Render story documents with scenario outlines and examples tables (ONLY when decision criteria chooses Scenario Outline)
process: Load story graph from project area
For each story in graph, load existing story document
Keep existing sections: Story Description, Acceptance Criteria, Background, Scenarios
Add Scenario Outline sections with Examples tables to story documents
Save updated story documents to project area
Skip this step - use regular scenarios only
